header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.note: Summary of a booking request for Booker: https://www.dropbox.com/s/q2edpejt2w3djge/Booker_Data.png?dl=0

trans-unit.source: %user_name% submitted a payment in the amount of %amount% for the award ticket booking invoice #%invoiceId%
trans-unit.target: %user_name% 已支付獎勵訂票發票 #%invoiceId% 之款項 %amount%

trans-unit.source: %user_name% has updated this award ticket booking request

%user_name% has identified that a check written to %booker_name% in the amount of %check_amount% is being sent to:
%booker_address%
trans-unit.target:
%user_name% 已經確認要寄一張金額為 %check_amount%的支票給%booker_name%，將寄到：
%booker_address%

trans-unit.source: Please write a check to %booker% and send it to
trans-unit.target: 請開一張支票給 %booker% 並將其寄到

trans-unit.source: With our award booking service, you can book your award tickets using your own miles and save on fees and taxes while at the same time spending as few miles as possible
trans-unit.target: 使用我們的獎勵預訂服務，您可以使用您自己的哩程、花費最少的哩程數進行獎勵訂票，並且節省費用和稅款

trans-unit.source: Also check other airports in the metro area, if available
trans-unit.target: 在可能的狀況下，同時查看該都會區的其他機場
trans-unit.note: In this case “metro area” means “metropolitan area” i.e. “a major city together with its suburbs and nearby cities, towns, and environs”

trans-unit.source: Do you have flexibility on your date to leave?
trans-unit.target: 您的出發日期是否有些彈性？

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple people involved in making your travel decisions and arrangements (such as a spouse or administrative assistant), please include their emails here to be copied on all communication. Multiple emails should be separated with a comma.
trans-unit.target: 若有多人參與旅行決定或行程規劃過程（例如配偶或行政助理），請在此處列出他們的電子郵件地址，以將他們加入成為副件收件人。請以逗號分隔不同的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: There are no records to display that match current filters
trans-unit.target: 沒有符合目前搜尋條件的記錄

trans-unit.source: Go to the booking request to post this message
trans-unit.target: 前往訂票請求以張貼這則留言

trans-unit.source: The client has not tried booking this award request on his / her own prior to contacting us.
trans-unit.target: 在與我們聯繫之前，該客戶沒有嘗試過自行預訂。

trans-unit.note: this is a list of booking requests

trans-unit.source: The client is OK with paying money instead of miles for the tickets.
trans-unit.target: 客戶同意以金錢而非哩程數支付訂票。

trans-unit.source: I am OK with paying money instead of miles for the tickets.
trans-unit.target: 我同意以金錢而非哩程數支付訂票。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately %booker% is not yet set up to accept credit card payments, please contact them to enable this option
trans-unit.target: 很抱歉，%booker% 尚未接受信用卡付款，請聯繫他們啟用該選項

trans-unit.source: Please click "Continue" to let us know you are sending a check.
trans-unit.target: 請按「繼續」，讓我們知道您要寄支票。

trans-unit.source: Pay by a Credit Card, 2.9% fee will apply
trans-unit.target: 信用卡付款需額外收取 2.9% 的費用

trans-unit.source: Public link to create new booking requests
trans-unit.target: 建立新訂票請求的公開連結

trans-unit.note: You can leave this without translation

trans-unit.target: 未預訂 - 錯誤行程安排
未預訂 - 錯誤行程安排 / 費用
未預訂 - 正確行程安排 / 費用

trans-unit.note: Booker can choose ‘Didn't like’ as a reason to cancel user’s booking request.

trans-unit.source: For your account security and privacy, please create a new login username and password, or click to login
trans-unit.target: 為了您的帳戶安全和隱私，請建立一個新的登錄用戶名和密碼，或按此登錄

trans-unit.source: Specified contact person was not found

trans-unit.target: 航空公司和信用卡帳戶

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one loyalty account balance in order to submit this request
trans-unit.target: 您至少必須添加一個忠誠帳戶餘額才能提交請求

trans-unit.source: This account is already added to this request
trans-unit.target: 帳戶已經被添加到該項請求

trans-unit.source: Not seeing an account you wish to use for this request? You can always add new loyalty accounts here
trans-unit.target: 看不到您想用來請求的帳戶？您可以隨時從這裡添加新的忠誠帳戶

trans-unit.source: You must select at least one option
trans-unit.target: 您至少必須選擇一個選項

trans-unit.source: If necessary, you can update this user's details
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，您可以更新該用戶的詳細資訊

trans-unit.source: If necessary, ask the user to update the name in his/her profile
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，要求用戶更新他/她的個人檔案中的姓名

trans-unit.source: The specified traveler has already added a passenger to this booking request
trans-unit.target: 指定的旅客已經在此訂票請求中增加了乘客

trans-unit.source: A traveler with the same name is already added in the list of Members. Please disregard, if this is a different person
trans-unit.target: 已有一位同名同姓的旅客被加入會員名單中。如果這不是同一個人，請忽略

trans-unit.source: Have you or any other third party tried to book this award request prior to contacting us?
trans-unit.target: 在與我們聯繫之前，您或任何其他第三方是否曾嘗試提出這項獎勵訂票請求？

trans-unit.source: What were your award search results, so that we can determine if we can improve upon it?
trans-unit.target: 請告知我們獎勵搜尋結果，我們也許可以加以改進。

trans-unit.note: this is the earliest possible day of a trip

trans-unit.source: Please fill out your earliest and latest date flexibility, to maximize award availability.
trans-unit.target: 請填寫可以彈性調整的最早和最晚日期，以找出最多獎勵訂票可能性。

trans-unit.note: this is the latest possible day of a trip

trans-unit.source: How many days do you want to be on your trip, excluding flight days?
trans-unit.target: 除了飛航時間外，您希望的旅程天數？

trans-unit.source: Automatically send emails to this user from %booker_email% email address using the %booker_name% email template
trans-unit.target: 從電子郵件地址 %booker_email% 使用 %booker_name% 電子郵件範本自動發送電子郵件給該用戶

trans-unit.source: Birthdays are required by the airlines to make reservations or courtesy holds
trans-unit.target: 航空公司需要出生日期來訂票或保留

trans-unit.source: Exactly as it appears on your passport
Add a new passenger, that doesn't yet exist as a Member of %booker%.
trans-unit.target: 添加一名尚非 %booker% 會員的新乘客。

trans-unit.source: Gain full control of the personal account
trans-unit.target: 獲得個人帳戶完整控制權

trans-unit.source:
We noticed you have not finished submitting your booking request.
Would you like us to recover your data so that you can finish it up?
trans-unit.target:
我們注意到您尚未提交訂票請求。
您希望我們還原您的資料，以便您繼續完成嗎？

trans-unit.source: Do you have flexibility on your date to return?
trans-unit.target: 您的回程日期是否有些彈性？

trans-unit.source: Do you have flexibility on the number of days of your trip, excluding flight days?
trans-unit.target: 除了飛航時間外，您的旅程天數是否有些彈性？

trans-unit.source: As seat preferences are a very personal issue, to ensure you get the seat assignments that best meet your needs, please contact the airlines directly:
trans-unit.target: 由於座位的喜好是很個人的選擇，為確保您獲得最符合您需求的座位安排，請您直接聯繫航空公司：

trans-unit.source: Please, request full access from the account owner
trans-unit.target: 請向該帳戶的所有者取得完整訪問權限

trans-unit.source: You may need to inform the user that he or she needs to update this account username or password in order for you to be able to auto-login to this account. The user would need to do that from the following URL
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要通知該用戶，他或她需要更新該帳戶的用戶名稱或密碼，以便您能夠自動登錄到該帳戶。該用戶需要從以下網址完成該操作

trans-unit.source: Last time we tried updating this account it got the following error
trans-unit.target: 上次我們嘗試更新該帳戶卻出現以下錯誤

trans-unit.source: You can try updating this account credentials via this page in order to fix this problem
trans-unit.target: 您可以嘗試通過此頁面更新該帳戶的憑證，以解決這個問題

trans-unit.source: The following accounts have been requested to be shared with %booker%
trans-unit.target: 以下帳戶已被請求與 %booker% 共享

trans-unit.source: %name% has securely shared the following accounts with you
trans-unit.target: %name% 已經安全地與您共享了下列帳戶

trans-unit.source: You are all done. Accounts listed above (with passwords) have been shared with %booker%. If you want to undo this, follow this link
trans-unit.target: 您已全部完成。 上面列出的帳戶（帶密碼）已經與 %booker% 共享。如果您想撤消此操作，請按這個連結

trans-unit.source: This account was requested for sharing
You are not done yet, you have the following accounts to share
trans-unit.target: 您尚未完成， 您有以下帳戶可共享

trans-unit.source: You are being asked to share the following accounts
trans-unit.target: 您被請求共享以下帳戶

trans-unit.source: You have successfully shared the following accounts with %booker%
trans-unit.target: 您已經成功地與 %booker% 共享了以下帳戶

trans-unit.source: I agree to the Terms of use and Privacy Notice (our lawyers require this, but there is no sharing of your email or account information with any third parties, and there are no financial obligations)
trans-unit.target: 我同意使用條款 和隱私權通告（這點為我公司律師的要求，但我們不會與任何第三方分享您的電子郵件或帳戶資訊，且不牽涉任何財務義務）

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to cancel this booking request?
trans-unit.target: 您是否確定要取消這項訂票請求？

trans-unit.source: This will tell %booker% to stop working on this booking request.
trans-unit.target: 這將會通知 %booker% 停止處理這項訂票請求。

trans-unit.source: Airline phone numbers for seat assignments
trans-unit.target: 航班座位安排電話號碼

trans-unit.source: We appreciated the opportunity to be your personal mileage bloodhound! Hope your travels are festive and meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 我們珍視作為您的個人哩程偵探的機會！衷心希望您的旅行充滿歡樂與意義。

trans-unit.source:
Dear %contactname%,

Your invoice is attached. Please remit payment at your earliest convenience.
Thank you for your business, we appreciate it very much.
trans-unit.target:
敬愛的 %contactname%，

附檔為您的發票。請在您方便時儘早付款。
感謝您的惠顧，不勝感激。

trans-unit.source: PROCEED TO MAKING THE PAYMENT NOW
You have already paid this invoice so this action is not required.
trans-unit.target: 您已經支付該發票款項，因此不需要動作。

trans-unit.source: You have already indicated that a check has been sent so this action is not required.
trans-unit.target: 您已經同意寄出支票，因此不需要動作。

trans-unit.source: %name% paid %total% for this request via credit card
trans-unit.target: %name% 以信用卡付了該項請求 %total%

trans-unit.source: %name% paid %total% for this request via check
Jump to the last internal message
Jump to the last user message
This email is marked as NDR, it means we sent 3 emails to this recipient and they all returned to us as non-deliverable.
trans-unit.target: 收到該電子郵件信箱的未送達報告，這表示我們已經發送了 3 封電子郵件，但是都因無法投遞而被退回。

trans-unit.source: We just sent you an email to verify the contact information we have on file. Please check your inbox (or spam/junk filter if needed) and click on the link to verify your email address. No work will begin until you have completed this step.
trans-unit.target: 我們剛剛發送了一封確認您的聯絡資訊的電子郵件給您。請查看您的收件箱（若沒收到，請一併檢查垃圾郵件箱）並按下連結以確認您的電子郵件地址。在您完成這個步驟前，不會開始任何其他作業。

trans-unit.source: The %booker% team is looking forward to working with you!

trans-unit.note: Summary of a booking request for Booker: https://www.dropbox.com/s/q2edpejt2w3djge/Booker_Data.png?dl=0
Summary of a booking request for Booker: https://www.dropbox.com/s/q2edpejt2w3djge/Booker_Data.png?dl=0
Summary of a booking request for Booker: https://www.dropbox.com/s/q2edpejt2w3djge/Booker_Data.png?dl=0

trans-unit.source: How would you like to pay this invoice?
The client tried booking this award itinerary prior to contacting %booker% with the following results
trans-unit.target: 在與 %booker% 聯繫之前，該客戶曾嘗試預訂該獎勵行程，卻出現以下結果

trans-unit.source: Professional Award Booking Service Powered by Awardwallet
trans-unit.target: Awardwallet 支援的專業獎勵預訂服務

trans-unit.source: Email with verification link was re-sent.
trans-unit.target: 已重新寄出有驗證連結的電子郵件。

trans-unit.source: Your award booking request was successfully submitted but is not complete.
trans-unit.target: 您已成功提交訂票請求，但尚未完成。

trans-unit.source: We just sent you an email with the following subject: "Award Booking Request #%requestId%", to ensure we can reach you via email going forward please confirm your email address by following a link in that email. Our team will use this messaging platform to discuss award options with you.
trans-unit.target: 我們剛剛寄給您一封標題為「獎勵訂票請求 #%requestId%」的郵件，以確認我們可以透過電子郵件與您聯繫，請按下該郵件中的連結確認電子郵件。我們的團隊利用本訊息平台與您討論獎勵訂票相關事項。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to delete this message?
trans-unit.target: 您是否確定要刪除這則留言？

trans-unit.note: Summary of a booking request for Booker: https://www.dropbox.com/s/q2edpejt2w3djge/Booker_Data.png?dl=0

trans-unit.source: This booking request has been updated.
